install.name: Redshop Multi Currencies
install.author: redweb.dk
install.description: Shows a list of currencies, so your customers can select a currency for the prices.

param.name: text_before
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed at the beginning of the Module

param.name: product_currency
param.label: The currencies to display:
param.description: The selected currencies are shown in the module so the customer can select one of those currencies.

param.name: currency_mode
param.label: Currency Mode
param.description: If static, all the currencies will be displayed, if Dynamic, you can manage which currency to apply to which country

param.name: cid
param.label: Select Currency
param.description: If Currency Mode is Dynamic then select currency link

param.name: detect_country
param.label: Detect Country by
param.description: Detect Country by ip address or Billing Address

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
